title: Phalar Aluve
content:
Phalar Aluve Rare 2~11 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+1 Slashing Weapon Enchantment +1 Performance +1 Phalar Aluve: Melody Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The drow inscription on this blade appears to have been recently carved. It translates to: "Though I have to leave you, I will dance forever in Eilistraee's light. Longsword Finesse Versatile 1.35 250
